homepage.title: Sri Lankan Wildlife
homepage.content: Sri Lanka has unique wildlife, with diverse ecosystems and endemic species.

mangroves.title: Sri Lankan Mangroves
mangroves.content: Mangroves play a crucial role in stabilizing coastlines and supporting coastal ecosystems.

marine_life.title: Sri Lankan Marine Life
marine_life.content: The coastal waters of Sri Lanka are home to a rich variety of marine species.

indigenous_animals.title: Sri Lankan Indigenous Animals
indigenous_animals.content: Sri Lanka is home to unique indigenous animals, such as the Sri Lankan Elephant and Purple-faced Langur.
